about_the_game:
【Game Overview】

This game tests the player's observational skills in identifying wanted criminals scattered in various area situations from a first-person perspective, using zoom and pause functions.

The game can also be enjoyed as a walking simulator, as you will be walking around various areas due to the nature of the game.

　(Note: The person on the wanted list may have a different hairstyle, eyebrows, and beard, so don't get caught up in that.）　　　　　　　　　　　　

【Synopsis】

You are in a hospital after being involved in a case and losing your memory.

A detective comes to you and asks you to help him find the culprit to solve the case as a material witness. A wantedlist will be given to solve the case.

【 About Video Distribution】　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　

No advance notice is required.

We would appreciate it if you could put a link to the store page of this game in the summary section of the video.

We are not responsible for any damage caused by the posting or distribution of videos. Thank you for your understanding.

【Handling of games】

Please refrain from unauthorized reproduction of this game, secondary distribution, or any unauthorized diversion of internal assets by analyzing the game.

This game is fiction. It is not related to any real person or organization.

name: WANTED?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500
  • Memory: １６ GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA　GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5.4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: It's not often that you look closely at the faces of people you pass on the street, is it? It's no wonder that there are people near you who look exactly like the ones on the wanted list .This game will test your observational skills.
